properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 8:08PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warnings continue for the Alabama River At Montgomery...R.F.
Henry Lock and Dam...and Selma...

.Recent rainfall is producing rises along the Alabama River...and
additional rainfall expected over the next 24 hours will only add
to the rising levels. Therefore...flood warnings remain in effect
at Montgomery...R.F. Henry Lock and Dam...and Selma.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Alabama River At Selma.
* from late Thursday night until further notice...or until the
Warning is cancelled.
* AT 7 PM Wednesday the stage was 42.6 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 45 feet.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by early Friday morning and
continue to rise to near 47.9 feet by Saturday evening.
* Impact...At 48 feet...Flooding occurs inland to between Johnson
Street and Old Montgomery Road in Selmont. Portions of Bloch Park
and the Selma Country Club begin to flood.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Thursday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
